dynamic-hibernate.query:
SELECT producer_Id, name, ip, check_Port, check_Url, check_Type, manual_Status, system_Status FROM CSL_PRODUCER WHERE 1=1 #if($producer_Id) AND producer_Id = :producer_Id #end #if($name) AND name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ip LIKE :ip #end #if($check_Port) AND check_Port = :check_Port #end #if($check_Type) AND check_Type = :check_Type #end #if($manual_Status) AND manual_Status = :manual_Status #end #if($system_Status) AND system_Status = :system_Status #end
ORDER BY producer_Id desc
